label: Christmas
description: In 2023 and subsequent odd-numbered years, Mother will have parenting time from 3:00 p.m. on December 23rd until 3:00 p.m. on Christmas Day; Father then will have parenting time until 3:00 p.m. on December 27th. Parents will celebrate jointly by arrangement.

label: Christmas
description: In 2023 and subsequent odd-numbered years, Mother will have parenting time from 3:00 p.m. on December 23rd until 3:00 p.m. on Christmas Day; Father then will have parenting time until 3:00 p.m. on December 27th. Parents will celebrate jointly by arrangement.

label: Father's Day
description: Children will spend Mothers/Fathers Day (Sunday) with the celebrating parent. On non-resident days, parenting time will begin after dinner the previous day (Saturday) and will end at 3:00 p.m. on Mothers/Fathers Day.

label: Spring Break
description: Parents will alternate the entire five-day Spring Break and the weekend following Spring Break, beginning at 9:00 a.m. on the first day (Monday) of Spring Break and ending at the recommencement of school on the Monday after Spring Break. In 2023 and subsequent odd-numbered years, Mother will have parenting time; in even-numbered years, Father will have parenting time.
